sentences.sCn: …一位与政府意见相左的俄罗斯小说家。

trans.tranCn: 持不同政见者，意见不同的人
trans.tranOther: someone who publicly criticizes the government in a country where this is punished

trans.tranCn: 持不同政见的，意见不同的
trans.tranOther: Dissident people disagree with or criticize their government or a powerful organization they belong to
